history.proof: intros d0 d1 sigma t H1 H2. split. - intros [H3 H4]. hauto use: inter_semantics_0, dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles. - hfcrush use: dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles, inter_semantics_0.

ctx: intros d0 d1 sigma t H1 H2.
exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.

original: intros d0 d1 sigma t H1 H2. split. - intros [H3 H4]. unfold reconnait in *. unfold inter. destruct d0 as [p0 a0]. destruct d1 as [p1 a1]. unfold preDTA_produit. unfold iad_conv. split. + apply (predta_inter_def_0 H1 H3 H4). + apply (predta_inter_def_0 H2 H3 H4). - intros [H3 H4]. unfold reconnait in *. unfold inter in H3, H4. destruct d0 as [p0 a0]. destruct d1 as [p1 a1]. unfold preDTA_produit in H3, H4. unfold iad_conv in H3, H4. split. + apply (predta_inter_reciproque H1 H3). + apply (predta_inter_reciproque H2 H4).
